name: Piccadilly Inn Express

reviews.text: Comfortable room with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and iron. $9.95/day (ending at midnight) for wi-fi, which is a ripoff. The Courtyard across the street's high speed internet is free. My room was clean and the furnishings were nice. The foam pillows are a little thin. However, the shower floor looked like it hadn't been cleaned in a month. Send someone into my room with a scrubbrush, please - that dirty shower detracts from an otherwise good hotel room. You can charge meals at the Picadilly Inn next door to your room, but the Chateau is not a full service hotel.
reviews.title: Decent

reviews.text: Did everyone else stay at a different place? Cigarette burns on the bedspread, rock-hard mattress, smelly (non-smoking) room. Just nasty.
reviews.title: Big thumbs-down!
Very comfortable; wish I could stay longer
reviews.text: The girl at the front desk was nice, though.
I think we paid something like $20 less than the place next door (owned by same company), but I think next time I'll stay there instead. Or find something else, entirely.
reviews.title: Not good for business travelers

reviews.text: This place is near the airport, and I chose it because of that. I'd just spent a week visiting Sequoia, Kings Canyon & Yosemite Nat'l Parks.
reviews.title: Very nice, and a good value also

reviews.text: This is where we always stay before flying out of Fresno airport for business and pleasure. I often put our business travelers here as they usually have rooms at a reasonable rate. Free parking and shuttle for flying out. Parking is free up to 2 weeks. Nothing special, but clean and quiet.
reviews.title: Very fine room close to airport with free shuttle and parking
very nice
reviews.text: it was very nice looking and I enjoyed the stay.

description: Truly the best value for money accommodation you can find near Fresno Airport. Our customer service is the best in class. We take pride in offering our customer clean rooms and a quiet comfortable stay and a healthy breakfast in the morning.
